member.name: T:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1Toolbar
member.summary: C1Toolbar control represents a toolbar that contains the controls consolidated in the toolbar groups. Usually C1Toolbar consists from one or more C1ToolbarGroups.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a .

member.name: T:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarDropDown
member.summary: C1ToolbarDropDown control represents a drop-down button on the C1ToobarStrip. When clicking it displays popup panel with Content property or context menu set by Menu property.

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.summary: Invoked during a call of ApplyTemplate() method.

member.summary: Called when measuring a control.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarDropDown.Menu
member.summary: Gets or sets the context menu which is displayed when the control is clicked.

member.name: T:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.ToolbarOverflow
member.summary: ToolbarOverflow enumeration contains available values for overflow handling in toolbar elements.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.ToolbarOverflow.None
member.summary: Overflow is not handled.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.ToolbarOverflow.Menu
member.summary: Shows menu.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.ToolbarOverflow.Panel
member.summary: Shows panel with elements which do not fit to the main container.

member.name: T:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStrip
member.summary: C1ToolbarStrip control represents a strip that contains one or more controls. C1ToolbarStrip can be used alone or as content of toolbar group.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStrip.OverflowProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Overflow dependency property.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStrip.OverflowPanelProperty
member.summary: Identifies the OverflowPanel dependency property.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStrip.OrientationProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Orientation dependency property.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of C1ToolbarStrip class.

member.summary: Invoked during a call of ApplyTemplate() method.

member.summary: Called when measuring a control.

member.summary: Called when arranging a control.

member.summary: Creates the element to display the item.

member.summary: Determines if the specified item is its own container.

member.name: M:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStrip.PrepareContainerForItemOverride(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Object)
member.summary: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.

member.name: M:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStrip.UpadateMenu
member.summary: Creates menu from the "invisible" elements.
member.returns: True if there are elements in menu.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStrip.Overflow
member.summary: Gets or set the value that indicates how to handle the items which do not fit to the available space.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStrip.OverflowPanel
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for overflow panel.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStrip.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the orientation of the toolbar strip.

member.name: E:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStrip.OverflowItemAdded
member.summary: Fires when an element is added to the overflow items. The overflow items include the elements hidden from the toolbar strip due to lack of available space.

member.name: E:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStrip.OverflowItemRemoved
member.summary: Fires when an element is removed from the overflow items. The overflow items include the elements hidden from the toolbar strip due to lack of available space.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStrip.OverflowMenuItems
member.summary: Gets the collection that contains elements of overflow menu.

member.name: T:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStripItem
member.summary: C1ToolbarStripItem represents wrapper for the items on the C1ToolbarStrip. Each item added on the toolbar strip is put into the separate C1ToolbarStripItem.

member.name: M:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStripItem.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of C1ToolbarStrip class.

member.name: M:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStripItem.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: Invoked during a call of ApplyTemplate() method.

member.summary: Called when arranging a control.

member.name: M:C1.Silverlight.Toolbar.C1ToolbarStripItem.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)
member.summary: Called when measuring a control.
